body: It looks like https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/0aed3bcea676a9df4a5c1c26a9a5ca7151d85215 causes the editor process to become defunct on exit when updating the license file. This was reported in #11691. This reverts to using Spack's Executable instead of execv when updating a license file.
title: fix defunct editor exit in #11691
